name: Haikureader
0:
”Alexa open haiku reader.”
”Alexa ask haiku reader”
”Alexa, tell haiku reader”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: haiku reader
des: Haiku reader lets you receive original daily poems to everyone who needs an added dose inspiration. With new poems written daily choose, you'll be able to unleash your creative juices better, stay focused, relax quickly, and meditate on each haiku's meaning. If there is a certain topic you want us to write about in our poems, we can do that too. Just email us at Maren.fiorelli@gmail.com and we will start creating today.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
